Exaggerate: The expert's verdict suggests that the claim exaggerates Tomi Lahren's statement by stating that she said watching children being hit with tear gas was the "highlight" of her Thanksgiving weekend, when in reality she stated that watching the USA defend its borders was the highlight.
Problematic assumption: The expert's verdict highlights that the claim assumes that Tomi Lahren was referring to the tear-gassing of children, when she did not explicitly state that.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to prove that Tomi Lahren explicitly referred to watching children being hit with tear gas as the highlight of her weekend.
